shipping: We offer free shipping for orders over $50. Deliveries take 5-7 business days.
returns: Our return policy allows you to return products within 30 days for a full refund.
contact: You can reach us at support@example.com or call us at 123-456-7890.
hours: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.
support: Our support team is available via chat or email for any assistance.
